name: Animal Island (fey.earth)
description:
A Dark Force has trapped the critters of Animal Island in mysterious bubbles. Fortunately, Alfador is the hero-cat is here to release them! The type of animal that pops free depends on if you claw or bite the bubble... 

So much power rests in your paws...!

GAME JAM

This RPG Maker 2000 game was made for Mini Jam 50: Islands with the limitation "one level." We decided a single map made sense for one-level play! 

What features should we add as we continue to work on this game for the Major Jam: Isolation? Leave your comments below. :)
